recipesJson.name: Wavy Days
recipesJson.author: Heroldal
recipesJson.description:
I Searched around on e-liquidrecipes and took notes on different existing recipes.
My main Inspirations were 'French Smurf' by Darth Vapor and 'Blue Unicorn' by  HarrySmooth on E-liquidrecepies.com.

There is not much happening on the inhale and I would need some feedback on how to change that, but the Blueberry note is quite nice on the exhale for my taste.
I am also thinking about dumping the sweetener and change it for CAP Sweet Cream or amping up the Meringue.

Comments and Input are welcome
